name: react4xp-mono
description: React4xp monorepo for all NPM dependencies

scripts.clean: npm i rimraf && npm run cleanPackages && npm run cleanRoot
scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:react4xp && npm run postinstall:buildcomponents && npm run postinstall:client && npm run postinstall:constants && npm run postinstall:externals && npm run postinstall:nashornpolyfills && npm run postinstall:regions
scripts.postinstall:react4xp: cd packages/react4xp && npm i && cd .. && cd .. && symlink-dir packages/react4xp node_modules/react4xp
scripts.postinstall:constants: symlink-dir packages/constants node_modules/react4xp-buildconstants && rimraf packages/react4xp/node_modules/react4xp-buildconstants && symlink-dir packages/constants packages/react4xp/node_modules/react4xp-buildconstants
scripts.postinstall:regions: symlink-dir packages/regions node_modules/react4xp-regions && rimraf packages/react4xp/node_modules/react4xp-regions && symlink-dir packages/regions packages/react4xp/node_modules/react4xp-regions
scripts.link:all: npm run link:buildcomponents && npm run link:client && npm run link:constants && npm run link:externals && npm run link:nashornpolyfills && npm run link:regions && npm run link:react4xp
scripts.update: npm i rimraf && rimraf node_modules && npm install && npm update && npm update --dev && npm audit fix && npm run update:react4xp && npm install
scripts.update:react4xp: rimraf packages/react4xp/node_modules && cd packages/react4xp && npm update && npm update --dev && npm audit fix && cd ../.. && rimraf packages/react4xp/node_modules

author: Espen Norderud
